kpi.name: M1008C256

kpi_info.title: FAILED HSPA INTRA-RNC IFHO DUE TO UTRAN
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Intra-RNC HSPA IFHOs due to UTRAN. UPDATED: When the intra-RNC HSPA inter-frequency handover fails due to some other than UE related reason. This can be for example NBAP: RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE or Iub transmission allocation failure.

kpi.kpi_alias: FAILED HSPA INTRA-RNC IFHO DUE TO UTRAN
